## cdpctl backup

backup service

### Synopsis

backup service'

```
cdpctl backup [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  backup ServiceID ServiceID
  backup -g GroupName
```

### Options

```
  -g, --group string   backup all services under given group-name.
  -h, --help           help for backup
```
